definition[0]: a large group of weapons that someone has
definition[1]: a building where weapons are stored
definition[2]: the equipment, methods etc that someone can use to help them achieve something
example[2]: a software package that’s now part of our arsenal
example[3]: He has a whole arsenal of cameras.
definition[3]: a very successful English football team from North London. They play at the Emirates stadium in Ashburton Grove, Islington. They have won the League Championship many times and have ‘done the Double’ (=won the League Championship and the FA Cup in the same year) three times, in 1971,1998, and 2002. In 1994 they won the Cup Winners’ Cup.
